const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const ravelryApiService_1 = require("../utils/api/ravelryApiService");
const typeorm_1 = require("@nestjs/typeorm");
const pattern_entity_1 = require("./entities/pattern.entity");
const typeorm_2 = require("typeorm");
let PatternsService = class PatternsService {
    constructor(ravelryApiService, patternRepository) {
        this.ravelryApiService = ravelryApiService;
        this.patternRepository = patternRepository;
    }
    async create(createPatternDto) {
        const result = await this.patternRepository.save(this.patternRepository.create(createPatternDto));
        return result;
    }
    findAll() {
        return `This action returns all patterns`;
    }
    async findOneByRavelryPatternId(ravelryPatternId) {
        const entity = await this.patternRepository.findOne({
            where: { ravelryPatternId: ravelryPatternId },
        });
        return entity;
    }
    update(id, updatePatternDto) {
        return `This action updates a #${id} pattern`;
    }
    remove(id) {
        return `This action removes a #${id} pattern`;
    }
    async findOrCreatePattern(createPatternDto) {
        const pattern = await this.findOneByRavelryPatternId(createPatternDto.ravelryPatternId);
        if (!pattern) {
            const result = await this.create(createPatternDto);
            return result;
        }
        return pattern;
    }
    async findPatternNamesByApi(target) {
        const patternList = await this.ravelryApiService.searchPattern(target);
        const patternNameList = patternList.patterns.map((pattern) => {
            return {
                patternName: pattern.name,
                ravelryPatternId: pattern.id,
            };
        });
        return patternNameList;
    }
};

        typeorm_2.Repository])

exports.PatternsService = PatternsService;
